CustomField.description: This field is optional and is populated by an administrator. The default value is false, which denotes that the value of nFORCE__Limit__c is a hard set limit. When updated to true, the field enables returning offset records with appropriate section resource.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is optional and is populated by an administrator. The default value is false, which denotes that the value of Limit is a hard set limit. When updated to true, the field enables returning offset records with appropriate section resource.
CustomField.label: Offset By Limit
